alert.note: Alert for Siskiyou County from the Cascade Mountains East and South to Mt Shasta (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 09 at 4:59AM PDT until August 09 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR ABUNDANT LIGHTNING ON DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 284 IN CALIFORNIA... * Impacts: In eastern zone 284, lightning and very dry vegetation will likely result in new fire starts. Gusty thunderstorm winds could contribute to fire spread. Despite rainfall, initial attack resources could be overwhelmed and holdover fires are possible.In western portions of zone 284, strong, gusty wind with low relative humidity and critically dry vegetation could greatly increase the spread potential of any new and existing fires Tuesday afternoon and evening. * Affected area: In Northern CA...Fire Weather Zone 284. * Wind: South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. Near thunderstorms, quickly shifting winds to 50 mph are possible. * Thunderstorms: Scattered thunderstorms will continue into this evening. Storms will also become wetter today. * Humidity: As low as 10 percent in western parts. * View the hazard area in detail at: https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD

area.areaDesc: Siskiyou County from the Cascade Mountains East and South to Mt Shasta
